name: Organic Coffee Blend
description: A smooth, rich blend of organic coffee beans with notes of chocolate and caramel.

name: Ethiopian Dark Roast
description: Bold and intense coffee with a smoky aroma and deep chocolate flavors.

name: Colombian Medium Roast
description: Well-balanced flavor with hints of citrus and caramel sweetness.

name: French Vanilla Blend
description: Smooth, creamy coffee infused with the sweet aroma of French vanilla.

name: Hazelnut Flavored Coffee
description: Light roast coffee with a nutty and aromatic hazelnut flavor.

name: Mocha Espresso
description: Rich espresso with hints of dark chocolate for a bold taste experience.
